TopicTitle: (1.0.4 Compatible) SSP: Space Shuttle Program (On Hold for Internal Reorganization)

Articles.Content: Ok, feeling a little worn out by this, school, and work. I'm going to step away from SSP for a day (ONLY one day)

just making an announcement, jovzin will be my replacement, due to choices in management.

but fear not, I will continue to work in my own way on the new shuttle and the other things I have made.

my addons page will remain and continue.

I will see you there

just making an announcement, jovzin will be my replacement, due to choices in management.

but fear not, I will continue to work in my own way on the new shuttle and the other things I have made.

my addons page will remain and continue.

I will see you there

Good luck with what ever is going on

Good luck with what ever is going on

THANKS!

look forward to making payloads again too, and some more x craft. so much to do!

You will remain a part of the team though, right?

And hopefully this will let you work on the dreamer and x's much more (Looking forwards to those more, personally)

just making an announcement, jovzin will be my replacement, due to choices in management.

but fear not, I will continue to work in my own way on the new shuttle and the other things I have made.

my addons page will remain and continue.

I will see you there

Mike, i never made a full decision yet. I was trying to offer a way for you and him to settle your differences.

- - - Updated - - -

*sigh* I think I'm going to need more than a single day break...why did I have to step in when I did...

Mike, I've been talking with Sampa, and it seems as though there has been a large misunderstanding. You are not wanted off the team, and there are more details I can give you, and my opinion if you PM me.
Mike I just PM'd you

hello everyone , long time lurker here i am total KSP noob note that i was testing your absolutely amazing mod and want to give some feed back , first of all this is the most beautiful shuttle mod i have ever seen.Had great time while testing it but i have some problems

1.Nosecone RCS are not working (dont know what i did wrong)

2.Sometimes cargos are disappearing without any reason

3.Atmospheric flight is way too easy(im not using FAR)

here is some videos for you to better POV

http://www.twitch.tv/henezini/v/16357373 (in this video i somehow managed to messed up things and cargo was loose , i managed to recover it )

http://www.twitch.tv/henezini/v/16356231 (first random cargo disappearing)

http://www.twitch.tv/henezini/v/16684640 (second random cargo disappearing)

http://www.twitch.tv/henezini/v/16686426 (total noob atmospheric reentry)

As i said im total noob in KSP but these are some problems i encountered

Great job with mod thank you guys so much
I think Sampa quit!! :(

I think Sampa quit!! :(

?!?!?!?!?!? Please explain

I have not quit...just taking an extended break in order to clear my head. I'm not yet ready to give up on this mod.

Edited September 19, 2015 by Sampa
Let. Me. Help.

Hello all;

after spending time discussing the future of ssp with sampa, we have decided that I will be in charge of some reorganization of the structure of the mod while sampa is taking a break from this. I will not be kicking anyone out, but I will be talking in private to some people for their input on some things. Tomorrow morning (for me) I will be creating a new thread for this. It will make the mod close to the current structure of Google/alphabet, with "ssp" being alphabet, and the shuttle and other components being, well, seprate components. I will be adding the shuttle, the addon page, and the X-37 page at first, and I will ask other related mods if they would like to be a part. Hopeful this will help with the organization and efficiency, and will not hurt anything.

thank you.

Let. Me. Help.

Help Spock out, please
We aren't adding him to the team
Mike, I'm going to pm you now, so please check it
Spock, want me to have this thread closed for now?
Why is every shuttle mod cursed its like it doesnt want to be in KSP

I'm not out yet, just taking a break. Mike says he's out, but we are trying to get him back in. I am thinking of locking this temporarily while Spock gets things reorganized and I take my break to clear my head. After that, have it reopened
The OP doesn't make it clear, does this not have an RSS/RO config? Or does it?

Good god, what has this thread turned into? lol

Hello.

I am sorry but I have decided I do not want to be in your team. I will be on my own or planning to join with KSO creator as I am planning to have the shuttle more like KSO the biggest version of those orbiters with some nice little things.

Wish you luck guys and all the best.

@Mike we should really have that skype to be friends again and start from scratch.

Have a nice day.
Oh guys...not again. Will leave now, this is just a total mess, and I don't want to get into that.
